description.value:
Trigger determined by your catharsis emotion

Effect You gain the catharsis activation effects listed for your catharsis emotion. You gain that emotion's emotional fervor benefits for 3 rounds. When your emotional fervor ends, you suffer the listed emotional fallout. After using Catharsis, you can't use it again until you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Settle Emotions] activity.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Emotional Fervor]
